info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 04 at 2:47PM CDT until October 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON...WEST CENTRAL TILLMAN...NORTHWESTERN WILBARGER AND EAST CENTRAL HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 247 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chillicothe, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Elmer, Odell, Fargo, and Hess. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
